What I’m working on

Jekyll and static site generators

I’ve been building websites since I can remember when, but generally manually and very infrequently. In the past decade1, it’s largely been with Wordpress. I like Wordpress and still using it, but since started using Jekyll and Github pages for this very site to get down into the nitty gritty. There’s just something incredibly satisfying about actually making the thing yourself and I beginning to fall back in love with CSS like it’s high school or something.
